content_fields.desc: **Required.** The ``user_id`` of the room creator. This is set by the homeserver.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: Whether users on other servers can join this room. Defaults to ``true`` if key does not exist.
content_fields.title: boolean

content_fields.desc: The version of the room. Defaults to ``"1"`` if the key does not exist.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: A reference to the room this room replaces, if the previous room was upgraded.
content_fields.title: Previous Room

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The ID of the old room.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The event ID of the last known event in the old room.
content_fields.title: string

desc: This is the first event in a room and cannot be changed. It acts as the root of all other events.
title: The first event in the room.
